Authorities have cordoned off the area and imposed a no-fly zone as emergency operations and investigations into the cause continue.

This initiative aims to enhance call quality and reliability, particularly in indoor and remote areas with limited mobile coverage, while also reducing network congestion.

title: India–China reset: From Galwan storm to tactical calm; how long can this balance hold?
description: India and China have resumed high-level engagements and reopened trade channels after years of frosty relations, a move driven by mutual necessity rather than trust. While diplomatic and commercial ties see a surface thaw, deep-seated rivalries and unresolved border disputes persist, raising questions about the sustainability of this fragile detente.

title: The connection between sleep and health: why India’s sleep crisis needs tackling
description: The connection between sleep and health is straightforward: take care of your sleep, and your health will take care of itself. We have to shatter the belief that sleep reduces productivity and instead, incorporate it as a necessary component of health

description: In a 400-page charge sheet, police alleged that the accused, Gaganpreet Makkad, deliberately delayed providing critical medical assistance to the victim

title: ATF price cut by steep 7%, commercial LPG rate up ₹111 per cylinder
description: In Mumbai, ATF price was revised ₹86,352.19 per kl, while prices in Chennai and Kolkata were cut to ₹95,770 and ₹95,378.02 per kl, respectively

description: RPF sources said two persons on a motorycle, suspected to be in an inebriated state, came to the spot and reportedly asked the gatekeeper to open the gate. One of them, later identified as Karthi, allegedly assaulted and attacked the gatekeeper with a small knife

Indore water contamination deaths: Born after 10 years, family loses 6-month-old son
description: A six-month-old boy, born after a decade-long wait, has tragically died in Indore, allegedly due to contaminated drinking water. The infant developed severe symptoms, leading to his death. Chief Minister Mohan Yadav visited affected hospitals, ordered compensation for the deceased's family, and announced free treatment for all. Officials have been suspended and dismissed following the incident.

title: Lokpal scraps controversial tender to buy seven BMW cars
description: The move assumes significance as Opposition parties and civil society activists had slammed the Lokpal's decision to procure the high-end vehicles.

title: Vande Bharat sleeper to be launched in January! Check fares, route & other details
description: The first Vande Bharat sleeper train will run between Guwahati and Kolkata, Ashwini Vaishnaw announced on Thursday. Each Vande Bharat sleeper train has 16 coaches. The composition of the coaches is: 11 AC 3-tier, 4 AC 2-tier, and one AC 1st coach. The train can accommodate 823 passengers.

title: Pakistan witnesses drop in terror attacks since Afghan border closure: report
description: The comparative data for 2024 and 2025 reveals a sharp escalation in terrorism and counter-terrorism linked violence nationwide, marking an increase of 862 deaths, or a roughly 34% YoY surge in violence

Stuck in India: Amazon breaks strict RTO policy; allows remote work until March
description: Amazon is giving its India-based employees a temporary remote work pass until early March due to visa processing snags.  But, there are strict rules: no coding, no big strategy talks, and definitely no chatting with customers. This shows how big tech companies are really feeling the pinch from H-1B visa backlogs, messing with their work and how much gets done.

title: APERC approves true-up charges amounting to ₹4,498 crore
description: The true-up charges proposed by the three DISCOMs amounted to ₹5,933 crore, which came down to ₹4,498 crore after an adjustment of ₹1,435 crore made in the Commission’s earlier orders

description: Ad hoc changes and poor implementation mar the Election Commission of India’s Special Intensive Revision of elcetoral rolls

title: Tragic: Sikandar Raza's brother passes away at 13; Zimbabwe star posts emotional message
description: Raza himself responded to the tragic news on social media, sharing a broken heart emoji beneath Zimbabwe Cricket’s condolence message. The personal loss comes at a demanding phase in Raza’s professional career. He was last seen in action for the Sharjah Warriorz during the ILT20 2025, where he featured in 10 matches, scoring 171 runs and picking up 10 wickets.

title: In Maharashtra civic polls, a Marathinama vs Congress manifesto for North Indians
description: The ‘Marathinama’ seeks the fielding of Marathi candidates while giving preference to those “who speak Marathi fluently”. It also demands that Mumbai’s mayor be a Marathimanoos

title: Esha Deol pays tribute to late father Dharmendra as she rings in New Year 2026
description: Esha Deol celebrated New Year's Eve in Dubai, dedicating a heartfelt tribute to her late father, Dharmendra, by posing with the moon and a touching note.  Her brother, Bobby Deol, shared his love in the comments.  This comes as Dharmendra's final film, 'Ikkis,' a war biopic, releases today, marking his last performance and leaving a precious memory for fans.

title: Near record number of small boat migrants reach U.K. in 2025
description: Final figure yet to be confirmed; record of 45,774 arrivals was in 2022 under the last Conservative government

description: The protests, taking root in economic issues, have heard demonstrators chant against Iran's theocracy as well

UP: Drunk masked man in Bijnor holds minor at knifepoint, demands Rs 1L & bike; arrested
description: A 24-year-old man held a minor girl hostage at knifepoint in a Najibabad clothing shop. He demanded Rs 1 lakh and a motorcycle. Police arrived swiftly and rescued the girl. The man, who appeared intoxicated, was apprehended. He stated he wanted to go to jail. Further investigation is underway.

description: Sarfaraz Khan brought up his hundred in just 56 balls in what was a breathtaking knock. Ashwin also highlighted the batter’s performances in the recently concluded Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy (SMAT), where he amassed 329 runs in seven matches at a strike rate of 203.08 and an average of 65.80.

After UGC orders ‘dog-free’ campuses following SC warning, Pune universities say ‘it is really difficult’
Indore water contamination deaths: Probe exposes major lapses; residents told to avoid tap water
description: Seven deaths have been reported in Indore's Bhagirathpura following a water contamination incident, with 162 patients hospitalized. A probe revealed a newly constructed toilet dumping waste directly above a loose joint in the main water supply pipeline, causing the contamination. Authorities are flushing the system and providing alternative water sources.

title: Dozens killed, over 100 people injured after explosion rocks bar in Swiss ski resort
Switzerland bar blast: Several killed in fire at bar in ski resort of Crans-Montana

Feb 1 GST hit: Cigarette, bidi, pan masala to attract 40% tax — check details
description: Starting February 1, tobacco and pan masala products will face new taxes. The government is introducing additional excise duties and a health cess, replacing the existing GST compensation cess. Pan masala will be taxed at 40% GST plus a new cess, while biris will attract 18% GST.

What next for Neerja Modi School after CBSE withdrawal; long road for reaffiliation
description: CBSE has withdrawn the affiliation of Neerja Modi School, Jaipur following a fatal fall of a Class IV student and findings of serious safety violations. The decision affects students, parents, and staff, with new admissions barred and several classes required to shift schools. While senior students may complete Board exams, the school faces a long and conditional path towards possible reaffiliation after strict compliance with CBSE safety norms.

Ukraine drone plot against Putin: US intelligence rejects Russian claim — What the CIA says
description: The CIA has refuted Russia's claim that Ukraine attempted to attack President Vladimir Putin's residence, a statement echoed by US officials. President Trump, initially troubled by the accusation, later acknowledged a lack of confirmation. This incident follows a meeting between Trump and Ukrainian President Zelenskyy, where progress on peace talks remained limited.

title: Faridabad gangrape case: Woman’s cries unheard on foggy, isolated road — chilling details emerge
description: A 25-year-old woman endured a harrowing ordeal, allegedly gang-raped for nearly three hours inside a moving van on a fog-shrouded Gurgaon-Faridabad Road. Her cries for help went unheard due to the dense fog and isolation. Police have arrested two van drivers, with further identification procedures pending. The victim sustained severe injuries and is recovering.

CBSE to train teachers for mandatory skill education from Jan 5: Check key details
description: CBSE will begin one-day, offline Capacity Building Programmes (CBPs) from January 5, 2026 to train teachers and school leaders for mandatory Skill Education in Classes 6–8, using NCERT’s Kaushal Bodh activity books. The move advances NEP 2020’s early skills vision. Here’s the schedule, key venues and what schools must implement—timetable hours, projects, assessment and the year-end Kaushal Mela.

title: Indian-origin Mamdani sworn in as New York City first Muslim mayor at historic subway station — watch
description: Indian-origin Zohran Mamdani was sworn in as New York City's first Muslim mayor early Thursday, beginning a four-year term. The 34-year-old Democrat took the oath at the City Hall subway station, with a larger public ceremony to follow. Mamdani, known for his left-leaning views, previously served in the New York State Assembly.

The unseasonal rains, which began shortly before 6 am and gradually reduced, made the weather pleasant for many residents. Social media users shared their surprise and appreciation for the beautiful, albeit unusual, weather.

'Impossible targets': Riders flag unsafe roads, shrinking earnings — what triggered gig workers' protest
description: Delivery workers across India observed a New Year's Eve strike protesting low pay and lack of social security, despite app-based platforms offering festive bonuses. While many customers remained unaware, several orders faced significant delays. Platforms like Swiggy and Zepto increased per-order pay, but some workers refused the incentives, citing unachievable targets and the risk of ID blocking.

title: Pan India kidney racket exposed: Police names doc in organ trade; int'l links probed
description: Chandrapur police have busted a pan-India kidney trafficking ring with international ties, implicating two specialist doctors from Delhi and Trichy. The racket, involving illegal transplants in India and abroad, was exposed by a debt-ridden farmer. Investigations reveal a well-organized network of agents, donors, and hospitals, with transplants priced between ₹50 lakh and ₹80 lakh.

title: Ram’s ideals guided Operation Sindoor: Rajnath Singh
description: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh stated India acted with Lord Ram's ideals during Operation Sindoor, drawing inspiration from his virtues and role in vanquishing the wicked. He highlighted the Ram Janmabhoomi movement as a significant, centuries-long struggle that shaped society and laid foundations for the future.

title: Smriti shares cryptic Gita quote in year-end post after calling off wedding
description: As 2025 drew to a close, Smriti Mandhana took to Instagram on December 31 to share a recap video of the year gone by. The video featured glimpses of her World Cup-winning celebrations, cherished moments with her family, and snippets from her fitness routine. What stood out, however, was the quote she chose to end the video with—a line attributed to Lord Krishna from the Bhagavad Gita.

title: Stock market outlook 2026: Where are Sensex & Nifty headed? Top things to know
description: Indian equities lagged global markets in 2025 due to muted corporate earnings, FII selling, and missed AI rally. Despite touching record highs, broader market sentiment remained subdued. Experts anticipate a stronger 2026, driven by domestic growth, potential FII return, and improved valuations, with Nifty and Sensex targets set higher.

title: Neuralink and parenting: Meta AI chief Alexandr Wang on kids; will wait until Neuralink advances
description: Meta's AI head, Alexandr Wang, revealed he will delay having children until advanced brain-computer interface (BCI) technology like Neuralink is widely available. Wang believes children's early neuroplasticity offers a prime window for intuitive BCI integration, potentially enabling future generations to learn and utilize superintelligence tools more effectively than adults.

title: Happy New Year 2026: Over 70 wishes to share — images, quotes, status & more
description: As 2026 approaches, the article highlights the diverse ways people celebrate and express New Year's wishes. It emphasizes the value of simple, heartfelt messages, relatable quotes, and genuine status updates, alongside visual elements like images and wallpapers, to connect with loved ones during this transitional period.

title: Who is Taylor McGregor? ESPN reporter earns praise during Hurricanes playoff game
description: Taylor McGregor received strong praise while covering the Miami Hurricanes’ 10–3 playoff win over Texas A&M on Saturday. ESPN colleagues and fellow reporters applauded her work and presence on social media. McGregor continues to grow her profile at ESPN and MLB coverage, carrying forward a deep family connection to sports leadership.
